title: Luke Bryan pulls off mid-concert gender reveal
text:
Superstar Luke Bryan shared some big news for one country music-loving couple who are expecting their first child.

Ashley Link shared a video on Facebook of a special mid-concert moment at Bryan's show in Oklahoma City over the weekend.

"I held up a sign that said 'What will it be? Luke Please tell me! Girl or Boy,'" Link told ABC News. "We were several songs in before he actually came over and started talking to me."

"These damn gender reveals have gotten out of control," Bryan said as he accepted the envelope from Ashley and Jon Link, who were positioned right next to the stage thanks to their VIP tickets.

"How many children do you have?" Bryan asked the couple from Springdale, Arkansas. "None, this is our first," the soon-to-be-mother told the singer.

"I feel like I'm on Maury Povich right now," he added, referring to the talk show host best-known for his rowdy paternity tests.

Bryan said the information was printed on a green piece of paper and said, "Congratulations, you're having an alien" before pausing to read the results.

"First of all, it's very healthy, and you are having a girl," he announced as the crowd erupted with applause. "Congratulations!"

Link said Bryan "was a great sport about it" and couldn't remember if she had the chance to thank him.

"If not, I would love to send out a big thank you to him," she said. "He gave us a lifetime of memories!"
description: Country music singer Luke Bryan revealed the sex of an Oklahoma couple's first child mid-concert over the weekend.
